results.content:
Hey! Why did you not upload the whole source code for the 1st and 2nd project? I got stock up facing some errors while following your video in the 2nd project. I followed it from start to finish and see that you yourself have the same error as mine and unfortunately you cut the video without solving it? and when the next video was begin? you only edit a lil codes and voila! Magic it's working! WTF!?? but mine was still not and I have seen on the top of your code that there is a code that I can't see clearly and not familiar with that but I'm sure that wasn't showed on the video coz I watched all your videos carefully. You can check the 2nd to the last video and the last video to see what I'm talking about?

And also why did you not answer most of your students questions? I have seen many questions without having any answer coming from you? In your videos you kept saying that if we have any issues or questions we can put it on Q&A and you promise that you'll help us? but in reality.. I have seen you abandoned your students? WHY?

Lastly! we need your source code! WHY? Because we need to compare your codes to our codes and analyse why it is not working? and since you're not active instructor you must have to do that. And that is your promised in your videos.
